sourcesContent: import {CBadge, CDataTable, CDropdown, CDropdownItem, CDropdownMenu, CDropdownToggle} from "@coreui/react"; import React from "react"; const getBadge = status => { switch (status) { case 'Active': return 'success' case 'Inactive': return 'secondary' case 'Pending': return 'warning' case 'Banned': return 'danger' default: return 'primary' } } const fields = [ 'productName', 'productCategory', 'productType', 'productQuantity', "costPrice", "sellingPrice", 'actions'] const ProductTable = (props) => { console.log(props.productList) let productList = props.productList console.log("table data--------" + productList) return ( ( {item.status} ), 'actions': () => ( Actions View Edit Delete ) }} /> ) } export default ProductTable
